Grievance_Description: Help! Two men are following a girl near the bus station, she looks terrified.
There is a huge fire in the chemical factory on 4th Street!
I have been robbed at gunpoint in the main market area.
An electric pole has fallen on the road and live wires are sparking.
A pregnant woman is in critical labor and needs an ambulance immediately.
Large snake entered my house, my children are trapped in the bedroom.
My neighbor is beating his wife severely right now, please send help.
Gas cylinder exploded in the apartment above mine.
There is a severe head-on collision on the highway, multiple injuries.
Someone is trying to break into my house through the back window.
Power has been out in our entire sector for 24 hours.
Sewer line burst and sewage is entering our home.
Traffic signals at the main junction are malfunctioning causing accidents.
Water supply pipe broke, thousands of gallons wasting on the road.
Street lights are not working in a high-crime area.
Dead animal carcass rotting on the road causing health hazard.
ATM machine swallowed my card and debited money without dispensing cash.
Live wire hanging dangerously low near the school entrance.
Shortage of oxygen cylinders in the district hospital emergency ward.
Tree branch about to fall on the power lines.
Garbage truck has not visited our colony for 5 days.
There are too many potholes on the road leading to the market.
My birth certificate application has been pending for 2 weeks.
Stray dogs are becoming aggressive in the park.
Need to renew my driving license, online portal is glitching.
Illegal parking is blocking the entrance to our lane.
Water pressure is very low in our area during mornings.
Mosquito fogging has not been done in our area for a month.
Public toilet in the market is unclean and has no water.
Pension amount has not been credited to my account this month.
Request to plant more trees in the new community park.
The paint on the zebra crossing has faded.
Suggestion to install solar panels on the government office roof.
Library books are very old and need updating.
Request for a new bench at the bus stop.
Noise from the nearby construction site during the day.
Neighbor's fence is encroaching slightly onto the sidewalk.
Request to rename the street after a freedom fighter.
Park grass needs trimming.
Signboard spelling is incorrect on Main Street.
Complaint about the behavior of the clerk at the inquiry counter.
Request for a new walking track in the city garden.
Street dogs are barking at night.
Dustbins in the park are broken.
Request to increase the frequency of the 5 PM bus.
Playground swing is making a squeaking noise.
Water tastes slightly chlorine-heavy.
Request for a yoga instructor at the community center.
Suggestion to host a cleanliness drive next month.
Street name plate is rusted.
